::Autofire/Scavenger::

Autofire watches Firestrike's body land in front of him, about to fire back at Hovotron when he hears a Decepticon behind him, hearing and detecting two weapons coming online. He hears the bot out, and then looks ahead at the group of Decepticons in front of him.

"You make a very good point," he says civilly, "We can, indeed, save the killing for a later date."

Still ready to defend himself if needed, he transforms into vehicle mode, picking up Firestrike as he does and putting him in a seat in his cockpit. He then flies over to Blindfear. "Get in, this confrontation is over."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavenger watches the whole scene, his weapons ready just in case.
